sections.heading: What is それに?
sections.content:
それに means "moreover," "besides," "in addition," or "furthermore." It adds supporting information or additional reasons to strengthen a statement. It emphasizes accumulation - piling up reasons or facts to make a stronger point.

高い。それに遠い。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." 忙しい。それに疲れている。 "I'm busy. Besides, I'm tired."

children.heading: Sentence 1. それに Sentence 2.
children.content: 美味しい。それに安い。 "It's delicious. Moreover, it's cheap." Between sentences Adds information

children.heading: Adding reasons
children.content: 時間がない。それにお金もない。 "I don't have time. Besides, I don't have money either." 疲れた。それに眠い。 "I'm tired. Moreover, I'm sleepy." Cumulative reasons

children.heading: Adding positive points
children.content: 便利だ。それにきれいだ。 "It's convenient. Moreover, it's pretty." 安い。それに美味しい。 "It's cheap. In addition, it's delicious." Multiple advantages

children.heading: Strengthening arguments
children.content: 危険だ。それに違法だ。 "It's dangerous. Furthermore, it's illegal." 無理だ。それに意味もない。 "It's impossible. Besides, it's meaningless." Building case

children.heading: Beginning of second sentence
children.content: 雨だ。それに寒い。 "It's raining. Moreover, it's cold." After period New sentence

children.heading: Works in both
children.content: Casual: 高い。それに遠い。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." Polite: 高いです。それに遠いです。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." Neutral connector

children.heading: Declining invitations
children.content: A: 映画に行かない？ B: 疲れてる。それにお金もない。 A: "Want to go to a movie?" B: "I'm tired. Besides, I don't have money." Multiple excuses

children.heading: Making decisions
children.content: この店がいい。安いし、それに近い。 "This store is good. It's cheap, and moreover, it's close." Accumulating pros

children.heading: Explaining choices
children.content: 買わない。高い。それに必要ない。 "I won't buy it. It's expensive. Besides, I don't need it." Multiple reasons

sections.heading: それに vs それで

children.heading: それに = addition (moreover)
children.content: 高い。それに遠い。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." Adding point Not cause-effect

children.heading: それで = result (so)
children.content: 高い。それで買わない。 "It's expensive. So I won't buy it." Cause and consequence

sections.heading: それに vs そして

children.heading: それに = emphatic addition
children.content: 美味しい。それに安い。 "It's delicious. Moreover, it's cheap." Strengthening point Cumulative

children.heading: そして = neutral addition
children.content: 美味しい。そして安い。 "It's delicious. And it's cheap." Simple connection Less emphasis

children.heading: Listing many points
children.content: 高い。それに遠い。それに不便だ。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far. Furthermore, it's inconvenient." Can stack multiple Gets emphatic

children.heading: Negative + それに + Negative
children.content: 時間がない。それにお金もない。 "I don't have time. Besides, I don't have money either." Piling up problems

children.heading: Positive + それに + Positive
children.content: 安い。それに品質もいい。 "It's cheap. Moreover, the quality is good too." Accumulating benefits

children.heading: それに...も pattern
children.content: 忙しい。それに疲れてもいる。 "I'm busy. Moreover, I'm also tired." も adds emphasis Double emphasis

children.heading: Building persuasion
children.content: 危ない。それに時間もかかる。 それに高すぎる。やめよう。 "It's dangerous. Moreover, it takes time. Furthermore, it's too expensive. Let's stop." Convincing through accumulation

children.heading: Using for cause-effect
children.content: Wrong: 雨だ。それに家にいる。⚠️ Correct: 雨だ。だから家にいる。✓ "It's raining. So I'm staying home." Use だから/それで for results それに for adding points

children.heading: Confusing with それから
children.content: それに: Moreover (addition) 高い。それに遠い。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." それから: And then (sequence) 買った。それから帰った。 "I bought it. And then I went home." Different functions

children.heading: Emphasizing accumulation
children.content: 忙しい。それにストレスも多い。 "I'm busy. On top of that, there's lots of stress." Piling on

children.heading: Adding descriptions
children.content: 美しい。それに親切だ。 "She's beautiful. Moreover, she's kind." きれいだ。それに賢い。 "She's pretty. Furthermore, she's smart." Multiple qualities

children.heading: Listing problems
children.content: 難しい。それに時間もかかる。 "It's difficult. Besides, it also takes time." 危険だ。それに違法だ。 "It's dangerous. Moreover, it's illegal." Strengthening objection

children.heading: Convincing someone
children.content: この方法がいい。安い。それに簡単だ。 それに効果的だ。 "This method is good. It's cheap. Moreover, it's simple. Furthermore, it's effective." Building strong case

children.heading: 加えて (in addition - formal)
children.content: 便利である。加えて経済的でもある。 "It's convenient. In addition, it's economical." More formal writing

children.heading: さらに (furthermore - formal)
children.content: 効果的だ。さらにコストも低い。 "It's effective. Furthermore, the cost is low." Formal contexts

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 高い。それに遠い。 "It's expensive. Moreover, it's far." 忙しい。それに疲れている。 "I'm busy. Besides, I'm tired." 美味しい。それに安い。 "It's delicious. Moreover, it's cheap." 時間がない。それにお金もない。 "I don't have time. Besides, I don't have money either." 便利だ。それにきれいだ。 "It's convenient. Moreover, it's pretty."

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: このアパートは駅から近い。それに家賃も 安い。それに周りに店も多い。 とても住みやすいと思う。 "This apartment is close to the station. Moreover, the rent is cheap. Furthermore, there are many stores nearby. I think it's very easy to live in." 彼は仕事ができる。それに人柄もいい。 それに後輩の面倒もよく見る。 本当に素晴らしい先輩だ。 "He's good at his work. Moreover, he has a good personality. Furthermore, he takes good care of juniors. He's really a wonderful senior." 今日は疲れた。それに明日も早い。 それに天気も悪い。出かけるのは やめておこう。 "I'm tired today. Besides, tomorrow is also early. Moreover, the weather is bad. Let's not go out."
